Title: The Wednesday Incident
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Brigitte Liebowitz (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Peralta sets out to prove that--for once--he is not the source of captain Holt's bad mood. Boyle apprehends a notorious bank robber, who turns out to a harmless-looking old man whom nobody else believes committed the crime.
